query: query TvSeriesTrivias($tvSeriesId: Long!, $triviasType: TriviaType!, $triviasLimit: Int = 10, $triviasOffset: Int = 0) { tvSeries(id: $tvSeriesId) { id trivias(type: $triviasType, limit: $triviasLimit, offset: $triviasOffset) { items { id isSpoiler text type __typename } total limit offset __typename } __typename } }
